Key Match Events: Luka Doncic scored 27 points and 13 assists
Dallas Mavericks led by as much as 30 points
Chicago Bulls shot just 41.9% from the floor and 28.6% from 3-point range
Kyrie Irving scored 17 points in the first quarter
Josh Giddey made a 3-pointer to help pull the Bulls to 43-37
Klay Thompson finished with 13 points and was 3-for-7 from beyond the arc
Post-Match Reflections: Chicago has lost three straight games
